name: Achievement_Mission_Guilt_1
description: On Guilt, achieve 5 stars without double jumping on normal difficulty.

name: Achievement_Mission_Shock_1
description: On Shock, achieve 5 stars without shooting.

name: Achievement_Mission_Guilt_2
displayName: No, Mr. Bond, I expect you to die!
description: On Guilt, achieve at least 4 stars without allowing the laser to leave the screen.

name: Achievement_Mission_Blame_1
description: On Blame, achieve at least 2 stars without destroying any turrets.

name: Achievement_Mission_Despair_1
description: On Despair, complete the level by switching no more than 30 times.

name: Achievement_Mission_Despair_2
description: On Despair, complete the level without existing longer than 20 seconds total in the water dimension.

name: Achievement_Mission_Shock_2
description: On Shock, collect the second secret without double jumping.

name: Achievement_Mission_Shock_3
description: On Shock, collect the third secret by jumping off the rail and landing back on it.

name: Achievement_Mission_Minimisation_1
description: On Minimisation, run through the sweeping lasers by holding right the entire time, collecting the secret, without taking damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Minimisation_2
description: On Minimisation, move backwards through the sweeping laser section without taking damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Minimisation_3
description: On Minimisation, achieve 5 stars without shooting.

name: Achievement_Mission_Blame_2
description: On Blame, run through the second sweeping lasers section and following platforms by holding right the entire time, collecting the secret, without taking damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Blame_3
description: On Blame, complete the long laser ladder by jumping and without taking damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Delusion_2
description: On Delusion, reach the blue vertical stripe by holding right the entire time and without taking damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Delusion_1
description: On Delusion, pass the first ladder without touching it.

name: Achievement_Mission_Delusion_3
description: On Delusion, pass the laser after the rail secret without double jumping, without taking damage, and by landing safely on the upper screen.

name: Achievement_Mission_Despair_3
description: On Despair, complete the final section without landing in the pit, and collecting the secret.

name: Achievement_Mission_Remorse_1
description: On Remorse, achieve 5 stars without jumping off a rail.

name: Achievement_Mission_Remorse_2
description: On Remorse, achieve 5 stars without shooting.

name: Achievement_Mission_Remorse_3
description: On Remorse, complete the first disappearing platform section spending fewer than 3 seconds in the water dimension.

name: Achievement_Mission_Panic_1
description: On Panic, kill the first enemy before he fires a shot on hardcore difficulty.

name: Achievement_Mission_Panic_2
description: On Panic, achieve 5 stars without shooting any flyers.

name: Achievement_Mission_Panic_3
description: On Panic, return to the moving platform after not touching it for at least 25 seconds.

name: Achievement_Mission_Rejection_1
description: On Rejection, complete the floating section without shooting, without taking damage, and collecting the secret.

name: Achievement_Mission_Rejection_2
description: On Rejection, complete the final jumping section backwards.

name: Achievement_Mission_Rejection_3
description: On Rejection, complete the floating section in less than 10 seconds, without taking damage, and collecting the secret.

name: Achievement_Mission_Distress_1
description: On Distress, kill all the enemies in the open floating section without taking damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Distress_2
description: On Distress, climb the final steps section without shooting and without taking damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Distress_3
description: On Distress, complete the open floating section without shooting, without taking damage, and collecting both secrets.

name: Achievement_Mission_Isolation_1
description: On Isolation, achieve 5 stars, killing everything (including mines).

name: Achievement_Mission_Isolation_2
description: On Isolation, during the rail section near the end of the level, only use one rail without taking damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Isolation_3
description: On Isolation, collect the final secret without jumping.

name: Achievement_Mission_Spite_1
description: On Spite, complete the vertical jump section without the heat meter rising above 50%, and collecting both secrets.

name: Achievement_Mission_Spite_2
description: On Spite, complete the vertical jump section without destroying the mine, and collecting both secrets.

name: Achievement_Mission_Spite_3
description: On Spite, achieve at least 2 stars without the heat meter rising above 50%.

name: Achievement_Mission_Rage_1
description: On Rage, achieve 5 stars without shooting.

name: Achievement_Mission_Rage_2
description: On Rage, achieve 5 stars without the heat meter rising above 50%.

name: Achievement_Mission_Rage_3
description: On Rage, compete the sweeping triple laser section in 2 sweeps of the lasers without taking damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Vengeance_2
description: On Vengeance, achieve 5 stars, killing everything.

name: Achievement_Mission_Vengeance_1
description: On Vengeance, complete the triple bridge section by holding right the entire time, without taking damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Vengeance_3
description: On Vengeance, complete the long run and jumping section without the heat meter rising above 50%, and collecting the secret.

name: Achievement_Mission_Torment_1
description: On Torment, achieve 5 stars without the heat meter rising above 50%.

name: Achievement_Mission_Torment_2
description: On Torment, achieve 5 stars without killing any small flyers.

name: Achievement_Mission_Torment_3
description: On Torment, cross the final platform, reaching the end of it 5 seconds before the moving platform arrives, without taking damage, and collecting the secret.

name: Achievement_Mission_Confusion_1
description: On Confusion, achieve 3 stars without jumping or double jumping.

name: Achievement_Mission_Confusion_2
description: On Confusion, achieve 4 stars without destroying any mines or crawlers.

name: Achievement_Mission_Confusion_3
description: On Confusion, switch 25 times during the final sweeping lasers section without taking damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Optimism_1
description: On Optimism, complete the switch section by only activating 3 out of the 4 switches, and without taking damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Optimism_2
description: On Optimism, reach the first checkpoint without double jumping, and without taking damage or dying.

name: Achievement_Mission_Optimism_3
description: On Optimism, collect the second secret without double jumping.

name: Achievement_Mission_Hope_1
description: On Hope, achieve 4 stars without killing anything except flyers.

name: Achievement_Mission_Hope_3
description: On Hope, achieve 4 stars, destroying all mines.

name: Achievement_Mission_Hope_2
description: On Hope, complete the final 2 disappearing platform jump sections without shooting, and without taking damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Forgiveness_2
description: On Forgiveness, achieve 5 stars, killing everything.

name: Achievement_Mission_Forgiveness_3
description: On Forgiveness, achieve 3 stars, performing only one jump or double jump.

name: Achievement_Mission_Forgiveness_1
description: On Forgiveness, complete the six switch section by only triggering one switch without taking damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Guilt_3
description: On Guilt, pull 5 seconds ahead of the laser.

name: Achievement_Mission_Alienation_3
description: On Alienation, achieve 5 stars without destroying any turrets.

name: Achievement_Mission_Alienation_1
description: On Alienation, reach the first ladder without touching any of the floating platforms, and without taking damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Alienation_2
description: On Alienation, travel from the first ladder back to the start of the level without taking damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Depression_1
description: On Depression, achieve 5 stars without moving vertically.

name: Achievement_Mission_Depression_2
description: On Depression, achieve 5 stars without taking any damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Depression_3
description: On Depression, achieve 5 stars, killing everything.

name: Achievement_Mission_Pity_1
description: On Pity, achieve at least 4 stars only switching once.

name: Achievement_Mission_Pity_2
description: On Pity, destroy the 4 turrets within 4 seconds.

name: Achievement_Mission_Pity_3
description: On Pity, destroy the second phase of the boss within 3 iterations of the laser.

name: Achievement_Mission_Suffering_1
description: On Suffering, achieve 5 stars without taking any damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Suffering_2
description: On Suffering, spend at least 12 seconds in the final crusher section.

name: Achievement_Mission_Suffering_3
description: On Suffering, achieve 5 stars, killing everything.

name: Achievement_Mission_Hate_1
description: On Hate, destroy every laser without taking damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Hate_2
description: On Hate, complete the first 2 phases only switching once without taking damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Hate_3
description: On Hate, achieve 5 stars without moving vertically.

name: Achievement_Mission_Regret_1
description: On Regret, reach the shield phase switching no more than twice and without taking damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Regret_2
description: On Regret, kill the boss within 2 iterations of the shield phase without taking damage.

name: Achievement_Mission_Regret_3
description: On Regret, kill the boss without shooting in the shield phase and without taking damage.

name: Achievement_Completion_World1
description: Complete the first world.

name: Achievement_Completion_World1_Hardcore
description: Complete the first world on hardcore difficulty.

name: Achievement_Completion_World1_5Stars
description: Achieve 5 stars on every level in the first world.

name: Achievement_Completion_World1_5Stars_Hardcore
description: Achieve 5 stars on every level in the first world on hardcore difficulty.

name: Achievement_Completion_World2
description: Complete the second world.

name: Achievement_Completion_World2_Hardcore
description: Complete the second world on hardcore difficulty.

name: Achievement_Completion_World2_5Stars
description: Achieve 5 stars on every level in the second world.

name: Achievement_Completion_World2_5Stars_Hardcore
description: Achieve 5 stars on every level in the second world on hardcore difficulty.

name: Achievement_Completion_World3
description: Complete the third world.

name: Achievement_Completion_World3_Hardcore
description: Complete the third world on hardcore difficulty.

name: Achievement_Completion_World3_5Stars
description: Achieve 5 stars on every level in the third world.

name: Achievement_Completion_World3_5Stars_Hardcore
description: Achieve 5 stars on every level in the third world on hardcore difficulty.

name: Achievement_Completion_World4
description: Complete the fourth world.

name: Achievement_Completion_World4_Hardcore
description: Complete the fourth world on hardcore difficulty.

name: Achievement_Completion_World4_5Stars
description: Achieve 5 stars on every level in the fourth world.

name: Achievement_Completion_World4_5Stars_Hardcore
description: Achieve 5 stars on every level in the fourth world on hardcore difficulty.

name: Achievement_Completion_World5
description: Complete the fifth world.

name: Achievement_Completion_World5_Hardcore
description: Complete the fifth world on hardcore difficulty.

name: Achievement_Completion_World5_5Stars
description: Achieve 5 stars on every level in the fifth world.

name: Achievement_Completion_World5_5Stars_Hardcore
description: Achieve 5 stars on every level in the fifth world on hardcore difficulty.

name: Achievement_Completion_Boss1
description: Defeat the first boss.

name: Achievement_Completion_Boss2
description: Defeat the second boss.

name: Achievement_Completion_Boss3
description: Defeat the final boss.

name: Achievement_Completion_Game
description: Complete the game.

name: Achievement_Completion_Game_Hardcore
description: Complete the game on hardcore difficulty.

name: Achievement_Completion_Game_5Stars
description: Achieve 5 stars on every level.

name: Achievement_Completion_Game_5Stars_Hardcore
description: Achieve 5 stars on every level on hardcore difficulty.
